body.name: Crucial RAM 8GB DDR4 3200MHz CL22 (or 2933MHz or 2666MHz) Desktop Memory CT8G4DFRA32A
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 57 mins
features: 3200MHz RAM can downclock to 2933MHz or 2666MHz if system specification only supports 2933MHz or 2666MHz
Improve your system's responsiveness, run apps faster and multitask with ease
Compatibility assurance when using the Crucial System Scanner or Crucial Advisor Tool
Micron quality and reliability is backed by superior component and module level testing and 42 years of memory expertise
ECC Type = Non-ECC, Form Factor = UDIMM, Pin Count = 288-pin, PC Speed = PC4-25600, Voltage = 1.2V, Rank and Configuration = 1Rx16, 1Rx8 or 2Rx8
body.description: CT8G4DFRA32A is a 8GB DDR4 desktop module that operates at speeds up to 3200MHz and has a CL22 latency. It is an Unbuffered UDIMM. It conforms to the industry standard DDR4 UDIMM layout of 288 pins and is compatible with systems that take DDR4 3200MHz UDIMM memory.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The fast, easy way to improve your desktop’s performance There’s an easy cure for a slow computer: more memory. Designed to help your system run faster and smoother, Crucial Desktop Memory is one of the easiest and most affordable ways to improve your system’s performance. Load programs faster. Increase responsiveness. Run data-intensive applications with ease, and increase your desktop’s multitasking capabilities.

Make everything on your computer faster Memory is a component in your computer that enables short-term data access, which your computer relies on for moment-to-moment operations, such as loading apps, browsing the web, or editing a spreadsheet. Installing more memory in a slow PC is the easiest way to improve system performance quickly. Multitask with ease If you’re like us, you use your computer to do lots of things at once. You might be editing a document while also looking at pictures and browsing the internet. This naturally leads to a performance problem: every app you’re running requires memory and competes for a limited pool of resources. Overcome this by installing high-density modules in each memory slot on your desktop for seamless multitasking. Install with ease – no computer skills required With just a screwdriver, your owner’s manual, and a few minutes of time, you can install memory – no computer skills necessary. Just watch one of our three-minute install videos, and we’ll walk you step-by-step through the process. Don’t pay a computer shop to do something you can do in minutes!

Maximize the value of your system At a fraction of the cost of a new system, a memory upgrade is one of the most affordable ways to increase performance. Get more out of your desktop by giving it the resources it needs to perform. Micron quality – a higher level of reliability As a brand of Micron, one of the largest memory manufacturers in the world, Crucial Desktop Memory is the standard for reliable performance. From the original SDRAM technology all the way to DDR4, we’ve engineered the memory technologies that have powered the world’s computers for 40 years and counting. Don’t settle for anything less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to open and install. Works as Described. Good value.
reviews.reviewText: The original stock SK Hynix RAM that came with a Dell Vostro 3681 Slim desktop went defective, which was a rare occurrence. This Crucial RAM was ordered and came quickly in less than 24 hours. It was an exact fit, and the computer was back up and running at the proper speed in less than 15 minutes. The packaging was a nice easy to open plastic packaging that did not require scissors and did not cut my fingers when opening. Opening the Vostro was way more effort than the RAMs packaging. Highly recommend Crucial as a brand for RAM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's Crucial what more do I need to say? Works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 8gb 3200mhz CL22 Ram stick. I have absolutely no complaints. My PC had 8gb from the factory and a remaining slot. For Roughly $18 I could double my ram. The stick installed without issue. The ram was immediately recognized by my PC. This stick can run up to 3200mhz. My motherboard only supports 2933mhz. The stick paired perfectly with my existing ram and everything is running at 2933mhz. There is a noticeable difference in speed and total performance. Happy with everything and would definitely buy more crucial when I am ready for more upgrades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product, Great price and great shipping timeThe ram came earlier than I expected after receiving the ram I immediately put it in my computer and it worked perfectly. I tried to make it match the same brand and spec as my last one although that’s not necessary in all cases I’m glad I did because it doubled my ram and I won’t be need ram for a little which is what you always want

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great and no issues
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install in a gaming rig, and had no compatibility issues out of the box. Plugged it in, and was gaming in minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HP TG02-0013W Victus. Worked with no issues
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to put into my or drawbacks. 100% compatibility. Sure it may not be the fastest ram but I didn't want to take the chance of ordering faster ram and have it not be compatible or have weird issues. This ram stick matches exactly with the existing stick that came stock with the victus. If you have compatibility concerns, I would recommend checking crucial's website for ram compatibility. The website has done me well so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good and cheap
reviews.reviewText: Worked just fine and was easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My computer really likes this
reviews.reviewText: Once the system gets used to the additional memory, everything runs a lot better. I thought 8gb was enough, but the upgrade to 16 made things a lot better, and without breaking the bank.

I added 2 of these to my XPS 8940. I now have 32 GB of RAM, it might be too much but I like my Dell very much. The computer recognized them right after installation. My RAM speed is 2666MHz (not 3200MHz) because of the i5 cpu. Not a big deal.
ideal et pas cher fonctionne très bien ma booster mon ordinateur qui ramer

I recently upgraded my computer's memory with the Crucial 8GB RAM, and I couldn't be happier with the performance boost it has provided. This RAM module has proven to be a reliable and high-quality addition to my system.First and foremost, the installation of the Crucial 8GB RAM was incredibly simple. The module easily fit into the appropriate slot on my motherboard, and I had no issues connecting it properly. The fact that Crucial provides clear instructions and reliable support made the whole process smooth and hassle-free.Once installed, I immediately noticed a significant improvement in my computer's overall speed and responsiveness. The additional 8GB of memory has allowed me to multitask seamlessly, and I no longer experience any frustrating lag or slowdowns, even when running resource-intensive applications. Tasks such as photo editing and video rendering now complete much faster, which has greatly increased my productivity.
Easy to install. I removed my old 8GB and put the 2 new 8GB cards in the slots in my PC.Works great, and at a good price, no problems.
